item.title: Build 2.5.0
item.body: Permissions support for worklog functionality.
item.author: Retra Team

item.title: Build 2.3.0
item.body: Bugfix and small improvement in default Project / Activity relation relation.
item.author: Retra Team

item.title: Build 2.2.0
item.body: Jira issues summary is now visible in title of issues. Second change is that tehere can be defiend default Project / Activity relation in Retra Configuration.
item.author: Retra Team

item.title: Build 2.1.0, 2.1.1
item.body: New integration with JIRA implemented (worklogs) and some bugfix.
item.author: Retra Team

item.title: Build 2.0.0
item.body: Invoice batch generating, filtering projects and employees for assign and some bugfix.
item.author: Retra Team

item.title: Build 1.18.3
item.body: Release notes here
item.author: Retra Team

item.title: Build 1.18.2
item.body: Release notes here
item.author: Retra Team

item.title: Build 1.18.1
item.body: Release notes here
item.author: Retra Team

item.title: Build 1.18
item.body: Release notes here
item.author: Retra Team

item.title: Build 1.16.000, 1.17.000
item.body: This release includes just bugfix.
item.author: Retra Team

item.title: Build 1.15.000
item.body: New format for importing workflow to retra named Retra CSV and change in importing outlook format to possibility set mapping of projects (replace of import rule) and set the invoice number.
item.author: Retra Team

item.title: Build 1.14.000
item.body: From now, it is possible to set flag for project, which means that on project can be logged work or not. Project could have defined category and estimation. Default invoice filter value for state is Open. Last but not least were done some performance improvement.
item.author: Retra Team

item.title: Build 1.13.000
item.body: This release includes just bugfix.
item.author: Retra Team

item.title: Build 1.12.000
item.body: This release includes improvement in project management (searching, creating) some small improvements in employee management and bugfix.
item.author: Retra Team

item.title: Build 1.11.000
item.body: From this release step for invoice generator can be parametrized - for each sequence and date filtering params on invoice list can be defined as range.
item.author: Retra Team

item.title: Build 1.10.000
item.body: This release includes small bugfixies and in daily worklog list there is now day name (and also flag if day is working or not).
item.author: Retra Team

item.title: Build 1.09.000
item.body: This release includes: redirecting to common Retra error page in case of some error, fix of problem during login without setting password, problem with importing bad outlook format, problem with connection pool and we have also improved hour pattern for creating worklog and schedule. Now it can include : with no minutes after that - it is valid :-).
item.author: Retra Team

item.title: Build 1.08.000
item.body: This release includes just bugfixies. Solving browser cache problems, null pointer problem on daily worklog and state problem in exported files.
item.author: Retra Team

item.title: Build 1.07.000
item.body: Main change in this release is new logo and themes. In Retra thera are now 3 themes and all of them are in 3 resolution (normal, low res. and hi res.). Change can be done in Retra Configuration. Of course we also fix some cosmetic bugs :-).
item.author: Retra Team

item.title: Build 1.06.000
item.body: In this release were improved some filters for selecting worklog items, was done some bugfix and the main feature is automatic generating code from sequence for invoice (activated is this feature in settings on settings).
item.author: Retra Team

item.title: Build 1.05.000
item.body: In this release was improved invoice management, filters on worklog overviews and LDAP integration.
item.author: Retra Team

item.title: Build 1.04.000
item.body: In this release was enabled bulk pairing worklog item with invoice, improved invoice management and small bugfixies.
item.author: Retra Team

item.title: Build 1.03.000
item.body: In this release was enabled pairing worklog item with invoice (now just during create or update worklog - this will be improved), some default settings were moved to external configuration files and again it includes bugfixies.
item.author: Retra Team

item.title: Build 1.02.000
item.body: In this release was improved Invoice management, configuration and it also includes bugfixies.
item.author: Retra Team

item.title: Build 1.01.000
item.body: In this release was added Invoice management and it also includes bugfixies.
item.author: Retra Team

item.title: Build 1.00.000
item.body: New generation of Retra is here. First release includes bugfixies, new theme etc.
item.author: Retra Team
